div.p: The biggest French PHP event organized by AFUP, the French PHP user group, organized in brand new headquarters: let's go to Disneyland Paris, at the Hotel New York - The Art of Marvel!

During two days, on October 13th and 14th, enjoy the company of our friendly audience, share your knowledge with +800 attendees, meet the companies who use PHP every day, in an environment that will bring even more magic to the language.
